unnormalised: **Social Media & Influencer Marketing: Follower Analytics are the New Chai Patti**
normalised: **Social Media and Influencer Marketing: Follower Analytics are the New Chai Patti**

unnormalised: Forget guessing games! Understanding your follower analytics is now as crucial as getting the perfect chai patti for your morning cup. Brands like Saree Saga in Chandni Chowk are seriously upping their game, diving deep into data.
normalised: Forget guessing games! Understanding your follower analytics is now as crucial as getting the perfect chai patti for your morning cup. Brands like Saree Saga in Chandni Chowk are seriously upping their game, diving deep into data.

unnormalised: Instead of just posting pretty pictures, they’re tracking which reels resonate most with their target audience – young women in Delhi and Bangalore. Which designs get the most likes? What time of day works best?
normalised: Instead of just posting pretty pictures, they are tracking which reels resonate most with their target audience — young women in Delhi and Bangalore. Which designs get the most likes? What time of day works best?

unnormalised: Dr. Sharma, a leading social media consultant from IIM Calcutta, says, “It’s about more than vanity metrics. Brands need to understand who’s engaging and why. Is it the Rs. 2500 Anarkali suit or the Rs. 500 earrings?”
normalised: Doctor Sharma, a leading social media consultant from I I M Calcutta, says, "It is about more than vanity metrics. Brands need to understand who is engaging and why. Is it the rupee two thousand five hundred Anarkali suit or the rupee five hundred earrings?"

unnormalised: This data-driven approach allows influencers to create content that truly connects. Even local businesses like Sharma Sweets, who recently expanded their shop to 1000 sq ft, are using analytics to understand what sweets are trending online and tailoring their inventory accordingly. No more guessing! The future of influencer marketing is personalized, precise, and powered by insights.
normalised: This data-driven approach allows influencers to create content that truly connects. Even local businesses like Sharma Sweets, who recently expanded their shop to one thousand square feet, are using analytics to understand what sweets are trending online and tailoring their inventory accordingly. No more guessing! The future of influencer marketing is personalized, precise, and powered by insights.
